text: James Franklin "Jamie" Hyneman (born September 25, 1956) is an American special effects expert, scientist, and television personality. He has been the co-host of MythBusters since 2003. Hyneman was born on September 25, 1956 in Marshall, Michigan. He was raised in Columbus, Indiana. He studied at Indiana University. Hyneman has been married to Eileen Walsh since 1989. He is an atheist.In a 2011 interview on Kevin Pollak's Chat Show, at 1:20:00, Adam Savage is quoted as saying "Both Jamie and I are atheists." ==References== ==Other websites== *Jamie Hyneman's M5 Industries * *Jamie Hyneman biography from the Discovery Channel Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American historians Category:Scientists from Michigan Category:American television personalities Category:American atheists Category:Educators from Michigan Category:Entertainers from Michigan Category:Entertainers from Indiana Category:Educators from Indiana Category:Scientists from Indiana
title: Jamie Hyneman
